alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lenawee County through 445 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Onsted, or 8 miles northeast of Hudson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds to around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Onsted around 430 PM EDT. Adrian and Tecumseh around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Rome Center, Macon, Springville, Cambridge Junction, Ridgeway, Palmyra, Tipton, Holloway and Rollin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
